column1: Little Goat Diner////Our waitress Raquel was great
column2: very friendly and attentive. They definitely have the service portion down at Little Goat. The menu is pretty massive
column3: but we perused during our wait. Gina A. was SET on the crumpets. Glad we went with her intuition
column4: they were fantastic and came with this amazing blueberry preserve. We also went with the hot crab dip which was so tasty! We all really enjoyed this. I thought the star of our side dishes was the tempura mashed potatoes. What could be bad about fried mashed potatoes? They came in two large blocks and with a really tasty sriracha-like sauce.
